description: When the verification status of a patient is changed the previous and new verification information is stored in this group of items.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VERIF_HX_PRE_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
When verification status changes stores previous value


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: VERIF_HX_NEW_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
When verification status changes stores new value


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: VERIF_HX_PRE_STAT_C_NAME

columns.name: VERIF_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: When verification status changes stores ID of user making change

columns.name: VERIF_HX_CHNG_DT
columns.description: When verification status changes stores date of change

columns.name: VERIF_HX_NXT_REV_DT
columns.description: When verification status changes stores calculated next review date
